overview:
Brandon Davis is a executive administrative and project management professional with international experience.

In his most recent role, he acted as the gatekeeper for the executive management team managing all internal and external communications and I acted as a liaison for all of the company’s domestic and international campus directors and staff.

Specifically, he performed an extensive array of routine and non-routine administrative duties, initiated and lead special executive projects, planned, scheduled, and facilitated meetings for both the legal team and executive management. In addition, he managed and mediated both internal and external disputes, complaints, and official grievances ensuring they were resolved with a high level of efficiency, efficacy, discretion, and fairness.

His role required of him strong analytical and problem solving a acumen, solid administrative skills, dogged resourcefulness and an autodidactic resolve; and, especially, an interpersonal finesse that allowed him to successfully communicate and build rapport across all levels of the organization.
